data.title: Meta-Problem: Evolution on Evolutionary Setup (Cynefin + CBR Required)
data.key_insight: APEX hunts are niche-optimal (BeeGuard 12% ≠ failure, optimized for bee nest defense). QD testing design itself = complex problem requiring CBR + Cynefin. Hierarchical escalation: L0 standalone → L1 pairwise → L2 triplets → L3 full QD → L4 env variation → L5 meta-QD.
